rice.Description: ORYZA is wholely owned by IRRI and is distributed in APSIM with permission. Goto http://www.knowledgebank.irri.org/oryza2000 for more info

variable.name: plant_status
variable.description: out, alive, or dead

variable.name: cropsta
variable.description: Crop stage(0-4)

variable.name: wagt
variable.description: Total aboveground dry matter kg/ha

variable.name: wso
variable.description: Dry weight of storage organs kg/ha

variable.name: wst
variable.description: Dry weight of stems kg/ha

variable.name: wlvg
variable.description: Dry weight of green leaves kg/ha

variable.name: wlvd
variable.description: Dry weight of dead leaves kg/ha

variable.name: rlai
variable.description: Rice leaf area index

variable.name: zrt
variable.description: Root length or rooting depth

variable.name: crop_type
variable.description: usually rice

variable.name: dae
variable.description: Days after emergence (days)

variable.name: dvs
variable.description: Development stage of crop (0-2)

variable.name: dvr
variable.description: Development rate of crop (oCd-1)

variable.name: hu
variable.description: Daily heat units effective for phenological development (oCd d-1)

variable.name: lrstrs
variable.description: Drought stress factor causing leaf rolling

variable.name: ldstrs
variable.description: Drought stress factor accelerating leaf death !-

variable.name: lestrs
variable.description: Drought stress factor reducing leaf expansion !-

variable.name: pcew
variable.description: Effect of drought stress on daily total gross CO2 assimilation of crop; reduction in potential transpiration rate !-

variable.name: tnsoil
variable.description: Daily amount of N available for uptake from soil !kg N ha-1 d-1

variable.name: nflv
variable.description: Nitrogen fraction in leaves on leaf area basis !g N m-2 leaf

variable.name: fnlv
variable.description: Fraction of N in leaves on weight basis !kg N kg-1 DM

variable.name: nacr
variable.description: Actual nitrogen uptake rate by crop !kg N ha-1 d-1

variable.name: ancr
variable.description: Amount of N in crop (live and dead material) !kg N ha-1

variable.name: anso
variable.description: Amount of N in storage organs !kg N ha-1

variable.name: anlv
variable.description: Amount of N in leaves !kg N ha-1

variable.name: rnstrs
variable.description: Reduction factor on relative leaf growth rate caused by N stress !-

variable.name: dtga
variable.description: Daily total gross CO2 assimilation of crop !kg CO2 ha-1 d-1

variable.name: gcr
variable.description: Gross growth rate of crop !kg DM ha-1 d-1

variable.name: ssga
variable.description: Specific green stem area !ha stem kg-1 stem

variable.name: eff
variable.description: Initial light-use efficiency (kg CO2 ha-1 leaf h-1)(W m-2 leaf )-1

variable.name: etd
variable.description: Reference evapotranspiration (mm d-1)

variable.name: etrd
variable.description: Radiation-driven part of reference evapotranspiration rate !mm d-1

variable.name: etae
variable.description: Dryness-driven part of reference evapotranspiration rate !mm d-1

variable.name: trc
variable.description: Potential transpiration rate of crop with given LAI !mm d-1

variable.name: gnsp
variable.description: rate of increase in spikelet number

variable.name: spgf
variable.description: spikelet growth factor

variable.name: coldtt
variable.description: accumulated cold degree days

variable.name: sf1
variable.description: spikelet sterility factor because of low temperatures

variable.name: sf2
variable.description: spikelet fertility factor because of high temperatures

variable.name: spfert
variable.description: spikelet fertility factor

variable.name: nsp
variable.description: number of spikelets

variable.name: gngr
variable.description: rate of increase in grain number

variable.name: ggr
variable.description: rate of increase in grain weight

variable.name: ngr
variable.description: number of grains

variable.name: wgrmx
variable.description: maximum individual grain weight

variable.name: cover_green
variable.description: green cover from crop

variable.name: cover_tot
variable.description: total cover from crop

variable.name: height
variable.description: height of crop
